first_para: Gareth Alan Johnson (born 12 October 1969; Bromley, London) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected at the 2010 general election as member of parliament (MP) for Dartford, winning the seat from Labour.

full.extract: Gareth Alan Johnson (born 12 October 1969; Bromley, London) is a British Conservative Party politician. He was elected at the 2010 general election as member of parliament (MP) for Dartford, winning the seat from Labour.
full.title: Gareth Johnson
